name: Yorbie
description:
The evil Dr. Zox has taken control of the planet Yorbia Prime, destroying the all-powerful Guardians while enslaving the remaining inhabitants. The future of bot-kind now rests on the shoulders of Yorbie, an unlikely hero who was arisen from the remnants of this once great civilization. Armed with his half-cocked wit and a hell of a lot of firepower, Yorbie is going to get some payback…
Play as Yorbie and fight your way through an all-out bot onslaught with an epic boss battle in this fast-paced 3D action adventure. Upgrade your weapons and enhance them with stacking bonuses to suit your playing style. Try out as many combinations as you like with the ability to re-customize weapons at any time in the weapon store. Scavenge components and bonuses from enemy bots, or even steal them from other players when they’re not looking. Hey, who said life was fair?

Video output in Full HD 1080p requires 1080p native display.

2-4 players
